      • showPrompt

        void showPrompt​(@NonNull
                java.lang.String prompt)
        Shows the specified message as an on screen prompt. The message will remain on the screen unless 1) replaced by a subsequent call to showPrompt(...) or 2) clearPrompt() is invoked.
        Parameters:
        prompt - The message

      • clearPrompt

        void clearPrompt()
        Clears any on screen prompt previously shown via showPrompt(String).
